dict.acceptation: 大约；旋转；到处，四处；在周围；
围绕；在附近；前后，左右；在…周围；

sent.orig: Annual visitors number estimation around 0.8 - 1 million person-time, daily peak around 6,000 person-time.
sent.trans: 预测年参观人数为80~100万人次，日最高峰值约为6,000人次。

sent.orig: Now, there are many around the Earth Observing System Such, and even on Mars around some!
sent.trans: 现在，在地球周围有很多这样的观测系统，甚至在火星周围也有一些！

sent.orig: Mope around He's been moping around (the house) all day.
sent.trans: 他整天都在（房子）周围瞎转悠。

sent.orig: The words we choose are arranged into groups, either around a noun or around a verb.
sent.trans: 我们选择的单词被安排到词组里，与名词搭配或者与动词搭配。

sent.orig: Fat around the hips and thighs is good for you but around the tummy is bad.
sent.trans: 大腿和臀部的脂肪有益，腰部的脂肪有害。
